title: Settings all reset?
body: Went into a game and found all my setting for map, sounds, etc. got reset anyone else having this issue, or is it preparing it to be in beta so it has to reset?

replies.body:
Hey BrianTheGame,

Thanks for the post!  

Is this happening every time you relaunch the client, or just that 1st time?  There were some server side settings issues a few days ago that forced us to throw up a ticker.
riot codebear is there a way you can give me a file of my old settings from 11-2-16 because my settings got reset for in game

A local version should be saved in game.cfg within your Config folder.  If this is not the case you can manually reconfigure by logging into a custom game 1v0.  Your changes will be saved upon closing the custom game.
